def.dt: :in or to a foreign country an actress who is popular both here and abroad both at home and abroad He hopes to study/travel/work/go abroad next year. The family came here from abroad [=from a foreign country] three years ago.
:going from one person to the next :talked about or known about by many people There are rumors abroad that the company is in trouble. A feeling of unease has been abroad these last few weeks.
:away from your home She doesn't go walking abroad [=outside] at night.
